name: Campfire Power Orb Skin
lore:
&8Combinable in Anvil



&7Item skins give your gear a fresh

&7new look! Apply them just like an

&7enchant book using the anvil.



&7This skin can be applied to &aRadiant

&aPower Orb&7, &9Mana Flux Power Orb&7,

&5Overflux Power Orb&7, and &6Plasmaflux

&6Power Orb&7.



&aFeatures!

&8▶ &7This skin is swappable between &a15

&7blazing campfires!

&8▶ &7Displays the amount of players

&7that have been buffed by this orb!



&4&lULTIMATE COSMETIC&r
